title: 72A.36 ACTION BY COMMISSIONER.
text: If after 30 days following the giving of the notice mentioned in section 72A.35 such insurer has failed to cease making, issuing, or circulating such false representations or causing the same to be made, issued or circulated in this state, and if the commissioner has reason to believe that a proceeding in respect to such matters would be to the interest of the public, and that such insurer is issuing or delivering contracts of insurance to residents of this state or collecting premiums on such contracts or doing any of the acts enumerated in section 72A.37, the commissioner shall take action against such insurer under the Unfair Trade Practice Act.
